items.title: Conservative historian wins Polish presidential vote
items.description: Right-wing historian Karol Nawrocki is Poland's new president, official results show.

items.title: More than 700 believed dead in devastating Nigeria floods
items.description: About 500 people are still missing in the town of Mokwa, and officials fear no more survivors will be found.

items.title: Ukraine drones strike bombers during major attack in Russia
items.description: President Volodymyr Zelensky claims the operation is Ukraine's biggest long-range attack of the war so far.

items.title: Eight hurt in Colorado fire attack after suspect shouts 'free Palestine'
items.description: The FBI calls it a suspected terror attack and says the suspect used a makeshift flamethrower.

items.title: Watch: Eyewitness captures video of Colorado attack scene
items.description: Eight people were injured after a man "started setting people on fire" at a mall in Boulder, Colorado, police say.
